      • pickTerritory

        public int pickTerritory(boolean initialTurns)
        Parameters:
        initialTurns - boolean flag indicating whether or not it's the initial placement step. If true, player can only place one army at a time.
        Returns:
        index of territory picked

        public Territory chooseTerritoryToAttack(Territory attackingTerritory,
                                         java.util.ArrayList<Territory> territories)
        Prompts player to choose a territory to attack. For use when the player is in the attack step of their turn.
        Parameters:
        attackingTerritory - Territory chosen prior to attack from
        Returns:
        Territory selected to be attacked

      • cardCheck

        public java.util.ArrayList<Card> cardCheck()
        Checks if this player has a set of risk cards to turn in If true, prompt the player which set of cards to turn in, also force the player to select a set of cards if they have more than 5 cards total.
        Returns:
        set of cards to be exchanged for bonus armies

      • threeOfAKindExtractor

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<Card>> threeOfAKindExtractor(java.util.ArrayList<Card> playerCards,
                                                                            int infantryCount,
                                                                            int cavalryCount,
                                                                            int artilleryCount)
        Organizes the player's cards to be supplied to the threeOfAKindSubsets method
        Parameters:
        playerCards - Current player's cards
        infantryCount - The count of infantry cards the player is in possession of
        cavalryCount - The count of cavalry cards the player is in possession of
        artilleryCount - The count of artillery cards the player is in possession of
        Returns:
        2D ArrayList of all possible three of a kind subsets

      • oneOfEachExtractor

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<Card>> oneOfEachExtractor(java.util.ArrayList<Card> playerCards,
                                                                         int infantryCount,
                                                                         int cavalryCount,
                                                                         int artilleryCount)
        Extracts all combinations of risk cards where there are one of each card type (excluding wilds)

        cavalryCount - The count of cavalry cards the player is in possession of
        artilleryCount - The count of artillery cards the player is in possession of
        Returns:
        2D ArrayList of all possible three of a kind subsets
